title: Respond to a Request for Quotation (RFQ)
description: A new shipping line requests a quotation for stevedoring and other port services.

tasks.description: Receive the RFQ and identify the required services and estimated annual container volume.
tasks.expected_outcome: Sales manager logs the RFQ details.

tasks.description: Use the port's standard tariff or a pricing model to calculate the rates for the requested services.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager determines the price per container move and other charges.

tasks.description: Prepare a formal quotation document and send it to the potential customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional quotation is drafted and emailed to the shipping line.
